ai-patthana19.14:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.14:1.1_0: The way of taking up practices is a condition for the future,
ai-patthana19.14:1.1_1: the teaching is not the condition for the present.
ai-patthana19.14:1.1_2: Neither in the presently is a condition for the future, and for the sake of the present.
ai-patthana19.14:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.14:2.1_0: There are three preoccupations for the sake of extensiveness ...
ai-patthana19.14:2.1_1: After all three times later belonging to him ...
ai-patthana19.14:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana19.14:3.1_0: objects to the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-patthana19.14:3.1_1: objects to the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-patthana19.14:3.1_2: Though the teaching doesn’t give rise to the following thoughts, it doesn’t give rise to the three robes,
ai-patthana19.14:4.1_0: Namely in the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana19.14:5.1_0: objects is not by way of present objects, and also by the present objects.
ai-patthana19.14:5.1_1: Experiencing the teaching on the past, future, and present.
ai-patthana19.14:5.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the sake of a thought that arises conditioned by conditions, as its object: the three conditions for the future.
ai-patthana19.14:5.1_3: This is the section in brief.
